name: PublishTestPlanResults
description: Publishes cross-platform test results (xUnit, JUnit) to an Azure DevOps Test Plan
author: Bryan Cook

inputs.name: accessToken
inputs.label: Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Access Token used to obtain Test Plan details and publish Test Results.

inputs.name: collectionUri
inputs.label: Azure DevOps Instance
inputs.helpMarkDown: Url Azure DevOps instance, eg https://dev.azure.com/<your-org>

inputs.name: testPlan
inputs.label: Test Plan
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test Plan name or identifier. If not specified, will attempt to locate the latest active test plan.

inputs.name: testConfigFilter
inputs.label: Test Config Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Publish test results for the specified Test Configuration name or identifier.

inputs.name: testConfigAliases
inputs.label: Test Config Aliases
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-delimited list of Test Configuration aliases, specified as <alias>='<Configuration Name>'.

inputs.name: testResultFormat
inputs.label: Test Result Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: Represents which compatible framework the test results are formatted in. (JUnit, XUnit, TestNG, Mocha, Cucumber, etc)

inputs.name: testResultDirectory
inputs.label: Test Results Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder on the pipeline agent that contains the test results.

inputs.name: testResultFiles
inputs.label: Test Result Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: The relative file paths to the test results.

inputs.name: testCaseMatchStrategy
inputs.label: Test Case Matching Strategy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies how test cases are matched to test results (auto,name,regex,property,vsproperty). Default is 'auto'.

inputs.name: testCaseProperty
inputs.label: Test Case Property
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates which meta-data property on the test framework result will contain the test case Id. Applicable when testCaseMatchStrategy is 'auto' or contains 'property'.

inputs.name: testCaseRegex
inputs.label: Test Case Regex
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular expression used to find the test case id in the name of the test framework result. Applicable when testCaseMatchStrategy is 'auto' or contains 'regex'.

inputs.name: testConfigProperty
inputs.label: Test Config Property
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates which meta-data property on the test framework result will contain the Configuration name, id or alias. Applicable when testConfigFilter is not provided.

inputs.name: dryRun
inputs.label: Dry Run
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enables or disables publishing results to the TestPlan. Useful for evaluating Test Case Match strategies.

inputs.name: testRunTitle
inputs.label: Test run title
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies a name for the test run against which teh results will be reported.
